name: (Paper 3) Cambridge Key English Test (KET7) - Speaking Course
intro: (Level B1-B2) Develop your speaking skills for the Cambridge KET7 exam with this advanced course. You will engage in structured conversations, defend opinions, and practice fluent speaking in diverse scenarios. This course helps you build confidence and prepare effectively for the KET7 Speaking paper.
lessonNames: Discuss a controversial topic with your partner. The examiner will ask you to express your opinion on subjects like social media influence, environmental responsibility, or personal success. You must justify your views with logical arguments and examples.
